duties_responsibilities.duty: Safely operate a tractor-trailer combination to transport hazardous/non-hazardous materials while providing excellent customer service.
Load and unload freight, including generating sales leads and ensuring the safety of cargo.
Comply with all DOT regulations and company policies to maintain a safe and efficient operation.
Plan and execute flexible schedules, including day, night, and weekend shifts, to meet delivery requirements.
Maintain a clean and safe work environment, while upholding a professional and positive company image.

education_certification.credential: Valid Class A commercial driver's license
Hazardous Materials, Tank Vehicle, and Doubles/Triples Endorsements
